name: Fastest Gun in the West
description:
Fastest Gun in the West

You are the fastest gun in the West. However, every single lowly thug (and snake) out there wants to challenge that title - show them their place.

Controls
  • Aim with mouse
  • Shoot with left mouse button
  • Reload with right mouse button
Tools used
  • Unity
  • Aseprite
Credits
  • New Hero In Town by Kevin MacLeod
    Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5742-new-hero-in-town
    License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
  • Western Streets by Kevin MacLeod
    Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4617-western-streets
    License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
  • Pixel Western Font - designed and created by Mirz (Michelle Lehmann)
  • SFX from Ultimate SFX Bundle (some of them modified)

Originally made for GamesPlusJam2021

Theme: You're the best
